project.title: Project
project.desctiption: These are a few of the projects I have worked on through the past few years.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: You are more than welcome to connect with me through any social medium. Maybe we can develop something awesome together!

about.title: About
about.description: Get to know a bit more about my life, my goals and dreams

contents.name: My History
contents.description: Hi, I'm Santi, a hardworking student that wishes to become a top level programmer one day. I currently live in Monterrey, Mexico where I go to college, go out with friends and enjoy spending time with my family.

contents.name: My focus
contents.description: My main focus this semester is to get really good at UI/UX desing along with CSS tools in order to create the vision I have for the web pages I intend on developing.

contents.name: Hobbies
contents.description: My hobbies can be divided in 3 categories: 1. FPV Drone Flying. 2. Coding/Documenting/Reaserching/Learning and 3.Sport Climmbing/Running/Basquetball and stretching. Apart from that I love travel, meet new people and spend quality time with my life long friends.

contents.name: Hopes and dreams
contents.description: I've allways pushed myself to become the best at what I do. Hopefully one day I can freely do those things that enjoy the most: eat, travel, excersice and fly. I hope to do all of this stress free but allways looking forward for a new challenge.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: Get to know about my work experience, my education and courses

contents.name: Software Engineer & Data Analyst Intern
contents.description: Managed and created systems with the objective to record assistance and increase productivity within the business using Excel. Reports helped increment the on time delivery process from 80% to the year's objective 96% by isolating and analyzing individual departments and their working procedures. Worked remotely under pressure with multiple daily, weekly and monthly reports. Responsible for individual KPI analysis and followup of over 700 American employees.

contents.name: Software Engineer Intern
contents.description: Created a CRM using platforms such as Excel, Zoho CRM and Zoho Books that has had a huge impact in the automatization and optimization of the company's data and financial administration. Used SCRUM methodology to work at a fast and effective pace. Completed my milestones before due dates to run tests and deal with the company's transition and foster doubts and further system personalization. The system reduced working administrative hours from 20 hrs a week to 7 hours a week. Lead workshops to over 50 scouts in order to help increase the company's data health and increase individual scouting performance. I was then recognized for implementing detailed analytics that helped directives consult their data 20x more efficiently. Trained as a sales Scout for the company and have gained over 100 leads for their operation, increasing company’s revenue by 8% in only 2 months.

contents.name: Systems & Operations Manager
contents.description: Full development of a Notion System with the implementation of Notion's API. Helped to improve business operations performance by over 200%. Helped over 200 families in 3 months within my local area to disinfect their homes from Covid-19. Daily operation management of small teams driving the company's services. Developed Web Page using node js with React and some nice c++/html.

contents.name: Tecnologico de Monterrey, Campus Monterrey
contents.description: 6th Semester | Studying at Tec de Monterrey in Computer Science and Technology Engineering (ITC), awarded leadership scholarship

contents.name: Tec de Monterrey, Highschool CVA
contents.description: Graduated as best of my class, honors student in the IB program, 4.0 GPA, student body president, Co-Founder of multiple high impact social service groups aiming to maximize self-growth and encouragement in rural communities. Leadership medal awarded to only 5% of campus students within the leadership program.

contents.name: VGC International College
contents.info: Buisness managment exchange course in Vancouver, Canada
contents.description: VGC is an international college located in the heart of downtown Vancouver, Canada. VGC offers English courses and International Business programs.
